CustomField.formula: IF(OR( AND( NOT( ISBLANK(AcctSeed__Journal_Entry_Line__c) ), ISBLANK( AcctSeed__Journal_Entry_Line__r.AcctSeed__Project__c ), NOT( ISBLANK( AcctSeed__Journal_Entry_Line__r.AcctSeed__Journal_Entry__r.Project__c ) ) ), AND( NOT( ISBLANK( AcctSeed__Billing_Line__c ) ), AcctSeed__Billing_Line__r.AcctSeed__Project__r.AcctSeed__Account__r.Is_Internal__c ) ),TRUE,FALSE)
CustomField.label: Is Internal
